LuminaTable 2.0.0

Configure Action Buttons

opt_buttons.Rd

Configure button features such as column visibility toggle and data downloads. Accepts a list-based structure for flexible configuration.

Usage

opt_buttons(w, ...)

Arguments

w

A lumina widget

...

Named lists defining button configurations:

  • columnView: List with enabled, position, visibleColumns

  • downloads: List with enabled, filename, formats (csv, json, xlsx)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
lumina(mtcars) |>
  opt_buttons(
    columnView = list(enabled = TRUE, position = "top"),
    downloads = list(enabled = TRUE, filename = "data", formats = c("csv", "json", "xlsx"))
  )
} # }
